insights.finding: Use of NoOpPasswordEncoder (Plain Text Password Storage)
insights.recommendation: Replace NoOpPasswordEncoder with BCryptPasswordEncoder to securely hash and salt passwords. This prevents storing passwords in plain text and protects against credential exposure.
Remove .csrf(csrf -> csrf.disable()) to re-enable CSRF protection. This prevents Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks by ensuring that requests originate from legitimate sources.
Remove .headers(headers -> headers.disable()) and configure appropriate security headers like X-Frame-Options, X-XSS-Protection, and Content-Security-Policy to mitigate various web vulnerabilities.
